</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">0.9 Km/Lts rendimiento semanal<br> flota dia  Domingo 17/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">VIN..034182 , 1.1 Km/Lts<br>dia Lunes 18/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/rendimiento?d=%7B%0A++%22options%22+%3A+%7B%0A++++%22data%22+%3A+%7B%0A++++++%22labels%22+%3A+%5B%0A++++++++%22L%22%2C%0A++++++++%22M%22%2C%0A++++++++%22M%22%2C%0A++++++++%22J%22%2C%0A++++++++%22V%22%2C%0A++++++++%22S%22%2C%0A++++++++%22D%22%0A++++++%5D%2C%0A++++++%22datasets%22+%3A+%5B%0A++++++++%7B%0A++++++++++%22label%22+%3A+%22%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%28220%2C220%2C220%2C0.5%29%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22data%22+%3A+%5B%0A0.9%2C0%2C0%2C0.9%2C0.9%2C0.9++++++++++%5D%0A++++++++%7D%2C%0A++++++++%7B%0A++++++++++%22label%22+%3A+%22Rendimiento%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2890%2C90%2C90%2C0.5%29%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22data%22+%3A+%5B%0A0%2C0.0%2C0.0%2C0%2C0%2C0++++++++++%5D%0A++++++++%7D%0A+++++++%0A++++++%5D%0A++++%7D%0A++%7D%0A%7D&s=IW1EDJMzM0qa1739mYINYZi%2Bo5FjLCG9Je9yuwok2F8%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Manten el inflado de tus neumaticos con la presion adecuada, puedes reducir el consumo de combustible hasta en un 3%.</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="5" color="#A4A4A4">Comparacion semana anterior</font><br>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Revisa periodicamente el rendimiento de tus camiones, puedes generar importantes ahorros en los costos de operacion de tu flota</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Rendimiento de combustible menos eficiente de la semana</font><br>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Manten el inflado de tus neumaticos con la presion adecuada, puedes reducir el consumo de combustible hasta en un 3%.</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="5" color="#A4A4A4">Comparacion semana anterior</font><br>

<td width="167"><table border="0"><tr><td><font size="3"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b>14 Horas</b></font></td></tr><tr><td><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">Tiempo total en ralentí</font></td></tr></table></td>

<td width="167"><table border="0"><tr><td><font size="3"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b>54 Alertas</b></font></td></tr><tr><td><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">Alertas de falla y avisos totales</font></td></tr></table></td>

</table>
</td></tr><tr><td bgcolor="#F3F3F3"><table bgcolor="#F3F3F3" align="center" width="801" border="0"><tr><td align="center"><font size="4" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">54 Las alertas criticas que requieran revision las puede consultar en <a href="https://www.salfalink.cl">SalfaLink</a></font>
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://www.salfalink.cl/Mail/FallaR.png" width="39" height="34">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="4" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE"><a href="https://www.salfalink.cl/InformeUltimosDias.asp?IDU='+convert(varchar,312*1024-128)+'&TP='+'2'+'">Aqui</a> podra ver el comportamiento semanal de cada camion</font><br>
</td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td bgcolor="#F3F3F3" align="center"><table bgcolor="#FCFBFB" width="700" border="0"><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor ralentí de la semana</font><br>
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Revisa periodicamente el rendimiento de tus camiones, puedes generar importantes ahorros en los costos de operacion de tu flota</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Rendimiento de combustible menos eficiente de la semana</font><br>
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">0.6 Km/Lts rendimiento semanal<br> flota dia  Domingo 17/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">K224 , 1.8 Km/Lts<br>dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/rendimiento?d=%7B%0A++%22options%22+%3A+%7B%0A++++%22data%22+%3A+%7B%0A++++++%22labels%22+%3A+%5B%0A++++++++%22L%22%2C%0A++++++++%22M%22%2C%0A++++++++%22M%22%2C%0A++++++++%22J%22%2C%0A++++++++%22V%22%2C%0A++++++++%22S%22%2C%0A++++++++%22D%22%0A++++++%5D%2C%0A++++++%22datasets%22+%3A+%5B%0A++++++++%7B%0A++++++++++%22label%22+%3A+%22%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%28220%2C220%2C220%2C0.5%29%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22data%22+%3A+%5B%0A0.6%2C0.6%2C0.6%2C0.6%2C0.6%2C0.6++++++++++%5D%0A++++++++%7D%2C%0A++++++++%7B%0A++++++++++%22label%22+%3A+%22Rendimiento%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2890%2C90%2C90%2C0.5%29%22%2C%0A++++++++++%22data%22+%3A+%5B%0A1%2C0%2C0%2C0%2C0%2C0++++++++++%5D%0A++++++++%7D%0A+++++++%0A++++++%5D%0A++++%7D%0A++%7D%0A%7D&s=KrlxpsMsxsRm61njoihKHcPrH1ZtspuOC4SzhmL6INU%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Manten el inflado de tus neumaticos con la presion adecuada, puedes reducir el consumo de combustible hasta en un 3%.</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="5" color="#A4A4A4">Comparacion semana anterior</font><br>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">

<th colspan="3"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#2E64FE" >Vehiculos pertenecientes a <b>CVV</b></font></th></tr>
<tr width="100%" align="center">
<th><font size="3"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b> VIN            </b></font><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"></font></th>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Revisa periodicamente el rendimiento de tus camiones, puedes generar importantes ahorros en los costos de operacion de tu flota</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Rendimiento de combustible menos eficiente de la semana</font><br>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Manten el inflado de tus neumaticos con la presion adecuada, puedes reducir el consumo de combustible hasta en un 3%.</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="5" color="#A4A4A4">Comparacion semana anterior</font><br>

<tr><td align="center"><font face="calibri" size="2"color="#A4A4A4"><b>Guillermo</b>, SALFALINK realiza seguimiento semanal a tu flota de camiones, indicando las<br>variables más importantes de tu operación</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="left" bgcolor="#1F4E79"><img src="https://www.salfalink.cl/Mail/logo2.png" width="253" height="46"><br>

<tr width="100%" align="center">
<th colspan="3"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#2E64FE" >RESUMEN Vehiculos de <b>COPEC</b></font></th></tr>
<tr width="100%" align="center">
<th><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b> Total Camiones Activos            </b></font><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"></font></th>
<th><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b> Transmision dentro del periodo       </b></font><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"></font></th>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">3.6 Horas ralenti flota<br>Dia mayor ralenti Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 2.5 Horas<br>Unidad mayor ralenti dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/ralenti?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Ralenti%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B1.3%2C2.9%2C3.6%2C2.1%2C1.7%2C2.2%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=ou5fKQNiuLajZR5mzvfoa0OS90P3Q3lW%2Bct0XqC6r2E%3D" width="400" height="250"></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION: Evite el exceso de tiempo en ralenti ya que puede provocar daños graves en el motor disminuyendo la vida util de su camion</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Mayor consumo de combustible de la semana</font><br></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><table width="80%"><tr align="left"><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">209.1 litros mayor consumo<br> de flota dia  Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td><td><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4">CA10 , 176.4 Litros<br>Unidad mayor consumo dia Sabado 16/12/2017</font></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr><td align="center"><img src="https://charturl.com/i/pt-0Wvx/consumos?d=%7B%22options%22%3A%7B%22data%22%3A%7B%22labels%22%3A%5B%22L%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22M%22%2C%22J%22%2C%22V%22%2C%22S%22%2C%22D%22%5D%2C%22datasets%22+%3A%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22Consumos+%22%2C%22backgroundColor%22+%3A+%22rgba%2850%2C50%2C50%2C0.5%29%22%2C%22data%22+%3A%5B11.4%2C164.1%2C209.1%2C186.4%2C148.5%2C128.7%5D%7D%5D%7D%7D%7D&s=%2BBimFNFc9w96p0WXUDk4E8gLlRM3ZGOYPRhkxtnB3OM%3D" width="400" height="250">
</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Revisa periodicamente el rendimiento de tus camiones, puedes generar importantes ahorros en los costos de operacion de tu flota</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#A4A4A4">Rendimiento de combustible menos eficiente de la semana</font><br>

</td></tr><tr><td align="center"><font size="2" face="calibri" color="#2E64FE">RECOMENDACION:Manten el inflado de tus neumaticos con la presion adecuada, puedes reducir el consumo de combustible hasta en un 3%.</font><br><br></td></tr><tr><td  align="center"><font face="calibri" size="5" color="#A4A4A4">Comparacion semana anterior</font><br>

<th><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b> Con registros dentro del periodo       </b></font><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"></font></th>

<th colspan="3"><font face="calibri" size="4" color="#2E64FE" >RESUMEN Vehiculos de <b>COPEC</b></font></th></tr>
<tr width="100%" align="center">
<th><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"><b> Con registros dentro del periodo       </b></font><font size="2"face="calibri" color="#A4A4A4"></font></th>
